mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN incoming_type_flag = 'M1' THEN quantity END), 3), 0.0) AS arrivedQuantity, COALESCE(ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN incoming_type_flag = 'M2' THEN quantity END), 3), 0.0) AS inboundedQuantity FROM tbl_incoming WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND incoming_type_flag IN ('M1', 'M2') AND material_key = #{orderMaterialKey}
